text:
@JoeBiden Trump has thrown up his hands,totally defeated by COVID-19
Hurricane season is coming
Our cities are being fired upon
42 million Americans are unemployed
108,000 are dead
Economy is tanking
Trump built a wall around the WH cause he’s scared of us
I don’t think we can wait longer
